title: BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Announces Issue Of AUD 100 Mln Worth Of Subordinated Notes
text:
BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Announces Issue Of AUD 100 Mln Worth Of Subordinated Notes

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 09:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Announces Issue Of AUD 100 Mln Worth Of Subordinated Notes Sept 23 (Reuters) - Commonwealth Bank of Australia : * ISSUE OF AUD 100 MILLION WORTH OF SUBORDINATED NOTES * WILL ISSUE AUD 100 MILLION WORTH OF SUBORDINATED NOTES * CBA - SUBORDINATED NOTES POTENTIALLY EXCHANGE INTO FULLY PAID ORDINARY SHARES OF CBA IF A NON- VIABILITY TRIGGER EVENT OCCURS * ISSUE OF SUBORDINATED NOTES BY CBA WILL NOT HAVE A MATERIAL IMPACT ON CBA'S FINANCIAL POSITION * CBA - AUD 100 MILLION 3.66% SUBORDINATED NOTES DUE 2034 WILL BE ISSUED PURSUANT TO CBA'S U.S.$70 BILLION EURO MEDIUM TERM NOTE PROGRAMME

BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Announces Issue Of AUD 100 Mln Worth Of Subordinated Notes
description: BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Announces Issue Of AUD 100 Mln Worth Of Subordinated Notes
